018package net.sf.hajdbc.cache;
019
020import java.util.LinkedList;
021import java.util.List;
022
023import net.sf.hajdbc.QualifiedName;
024import net.sf.hajdbc.UniqueConstraint;
025
026
027/**
028 * @author Paul Ferraro
029 *
030 */
031public class UniqueConstraintImpl implements UniqueConstraint
032{
033        private String name;
034        private QualifiedName table;
035        private List<String> columnList = new LinkedList<String>();
036                
037        /**
038         * Constructs a new UniqueConstraint.
039         * @param name the name of this constraint
040         * @param table a schema qualified table name
041         */
042        public UniqueConstraintImpl(String name, QualifiedName table)
043        {
044                this.name = name;
045                this.table = table;
046        }
047        
048        /**
049         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.UniqueConstraint#getColumnList()
050         */
051        @Override
052        public List<String> getColumnList()
053        {
054                return this.columnList;
055        }
056        
057        /**
058         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.UniqueConstraint#getName()
059         */
060        @Override
061        public String getName()
062        {
063                return this.name;
064        }
065
066        /**
067         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.UniqueConstraint#getTable()
068         */
069        @Override
070        public QualifiedName getTable()
071        {
072                return this.table;
073        }
074        
075        /**
076         * @see java.lang.Object#equals(java.lang.Object)
077         */
078        @Override
079        public boolean equals(Object object)
080        {
081                if ((object == null) || !(object instanceof UniqueConstraint)) return false;
082                
083                String name = ((UniqueConstraint) object).getName();
084                
085                return (name != null) && name.equals(this.name);
086        }
087        
088        /**
089         * @see java.lang.Object#hashCode()
090         */
091        @Override
092        public int hashCode()
093        {
094                return this.name.hashCode();
095        }
096
097        /**
098         * @see java.lang.Comparable#compareTo(java.lang.Object)
099         */
100        @Override
101        public int compareTo(UniqueConstraint constraint)
102        {
103                return this.name.compareTo(constraint.getName());
104        }
105}
